data.message:
I saw the moment and fucking chased it when i got it i fucking tasted it then i noticed that everyone is copypasted then i  fucking faced it.

Am just walking in the street trying to go to where a belong,It have been so much for me trying write a song and i felt that every one i loved thrown me in a dark  alone.so i kept thinking is there is something that I own i think it was only me listening to this sad tone.now am drawing on my face a happy face that is shown but u don't know what is shown when am alone.
